message.content:
We scan the entire list of transactions for those where the type is “Depreciation.” In this dataset there is only one such transaction:

• Row “Depreciation20240101001” (date 2024-01-01) with amount 45749.47.

No depreciation was recorded in the opening (“Initial”) section, so the accumulated depreciation at the beginning of the period is zero. The only depreciation during the period is 45749.47 so at period‐end the accumulated depreciation is 45749.47.

Thus the answer is:

{"solution": {'Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value': '0.00', 'Accumulated Depreciation End Value': '45749.47'}}
